title: Dark Chemistry
description: Is it Love? Or is it … Dark Chemistry? If Haley Dubose wants to inherit her father's fortune, she has no choice. She has to leave sunny Southern California. Move to a little backwater town in Upstate New York. And run the chemical manufacturing company her father founded.What Haley doesn’t know—yet—is that a fresh new evil has emerged from the company’s lab.Synthetic pheromones. Odorless. Tasteless. Undetectable.They can be used to manipulate people in unspeakable ways.They’re in the hands of a man who intends to enslave the world.And Haley has fallen under his spell.
author: Kirsten Mortensen
